intro_text: Your patrol hears some odd noises coming from an abandoned Twoleg nest.
success_text: It's just an old loner singing to themselves.
fail_text: Your patrol walks into an ambush by a group of rogues and everyone is slaughtered.
decline_text: Your patrol decides not to investigate.
history_text: r_c was slaughtered in an ambush by a bloodthirsty group of rogues.

intro_text: Your patrol encounters a clearing where a lot of Twolegs linger.
success_text: They continue hunting undetected.
fail_text: The Twolegs notice the cats and trap them in their monsters. The cats on your patrol are never seen again.
decline_text: Your patrol decides to hunt elsewhere.
history_text: r_c was trapped by twolegs and taken away.

intro_text: There are dark clouds in the horizon and p_l wonders if they should continue.
decline_text: Your patrol decides to head back early.
success_text: While it's pretty gray up there, the promised rain never comes.
The cats become wet from the rain but otherwise the patrol is successful.
s_c makes a careful judgment, and the patrol keeps going, but they make sure to stay on the high ground as the rain pours down around them.
It's not worth the risk - s_c convinces the patrol to head for home.
fail_text: There is a downpour and a sudden flood from the overflowing river sweeps all of the cats in the patrol away.
history_text: This cat was drowned by floodwaters.

intro_text: Your patrol hears some odd noises coming from an abandoned Twoleg nest out on the plains.
decline_text: Your patrol decides not to investigate.
success_text: It's just an odd loner singing to themselves. The patrol greets them, and as the loner isn't inside c_n territory, it's a polite interaction without any hostility.

It's just an odd loner singing to themselves. When they see the patrol they invite them to sing too, but instead, p_l offers the somewhat battered looking and strange cat an introduction to c_n. It's got to be far less lonely than their current life.

Your patrol walks into an ambush by a group of rogues. It's only by the grace of Starclan that s_c is there, fighting with the ferocity of Lionclan, the strength of Tigerclan, and the flexibility of Leopardclan. Shaken, but no more than bruised, the patrol manages to retreat to safety.

s_c signals for the patrol to stop. Carefully, quietly, they explain their concerns about the unknown situation. And maybe they're being too cautious - but then p_l picks up on the scent of strange cats around the Twoleg den. Forewarned, the patrol retreats to safety.
fail_text: Your patrol walks into an ambush by a group of rogues and everyone is slaughtered.
history_text: This cat died from being ambushed by rogues.

There is a downpour and a sudden flood from the overflowing river sweeps r_c away. Somehow, gasping for air and paddling desperately, r_c is able to remember enough of their training to keep an eye out for driftwood, and sinks their claws into the first piece that's swept past them. It saves their life.
history_text: r_c was drowned by floodwaters.

intro_text: There are dark clouds in the horizon and r_c wonders if they should continue.
decline_text: Your patrol decides to head back early.
success_text: While it's pretty gray up there, the promised rain never comes.
r_c becomes wet from the rain but otherwise the patrol is successful.
s_c makes a careful judgment, and keeps going. They stick to the clifftops, avoiding the low beaches as the rain begins to pour around them.
It's not worth the risk - s_c heads for home.
fail_text: There is a downpour and a sudden flood from the overflowing river sweeps r_c away. With the little warning they have, they spot a branch being carried by the water, and strike out strongly for it. Exhausted and shivering, they nevertheless cling to safety as the floodwaters run their course.
history_text: r_c was drowned by floodwaters.

intro_text: As the patrol crosses a beach, shivering with the cold, there's a creaking, rushing sound, like a wave - but out of sync with the ocean.
decline_text: Your patrol scrambles back the way they came, fluffed up and panting.
success_text: The cats leap forward, dashing to the other side of the beach and up onto the rocks. They make in in time to watch the beach get lost under a tide of water from inland.

s_c shouts to get back! The patrol scrambles back the way they came and watches the beach disappear under a flood of water. It leaves behind a changed landscape, tons of debris - and a large dead sheep. Your cats pounce on the opportunity to scavenge.

s_c shrieks at the strange sound, paws digging into the sand as they turn and run for home. The rest of the patrol yowls at them to stop, running after them, but s_c is proven right when the beach disappears under a flood of water from inland. They've saved them all.
fail_text: The cats are in the middle of the beach when the flood hits them, freezing water rushing from inland, sweeping them straight out to sea to die in the cold ocean.
history_text: This cat was swept out to sea by a flood.
